name: EGGLY
description:
A short cooking adventure about making scrambled eggs.

Features:

  • Four unique endings!
  • Scrambled egg action!
  • Honestly that's about it!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move.
  • A button to confirm (S on keyboard)
  • B button to cancel (A on keyboard)

Made as an example game for Pulp Jam 1: Cooking.
